This can be something like a photo of the person or a company logo.. A QR code that contains the data of the current wallet item and can be read with a QR reader.. Select field for the SSI identity. How do I show my credentials? If you want to show your proofs offline, just show the QR code of the proof. If they want to show a proof online, they select the show function in the corresponding application. The external application will then call the wallet app where they can select their proofs.. How can I sign documents? Select a document in another app and share it with the Wallet app. The Wallet app can only sign verifiable credentials so far. How can I verify proofs? Select a verifiable proof in another app and click the "Details" feature there. This should open the wallet app. For more information, visit https://github.com/gXeeXqBHuHDFTaEnff3Z/ssi_demos. The proof is in an unreadable format. Terms of Use This data shall not be archived. My data shall not be archived by %s. My login identity shall not be remembered by %s. This data is only meant to be used in %s confirmed none
